<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE3210</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">The Santa Clause</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Der Weihnachtsmann</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le Père noël</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O Papai Noel</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il Babbo Natale</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η πρόταση Santa</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El Papá Noel</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This work sheet isto be used as a film review outline of the Movie "Santa Claus"THe work sheet Includes a number of "Cloze Test" activities.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">English</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Santa Claus</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">movie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">review</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses Arbeit Blatt isto wird verwendet, während
eine Filmzusammenfassungumreiß des Films "Sankt Claus"THe Arbeit 
Blatt eine Anzahl von "Aktivitäten des Cloze Tests" einschließt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cet isto de feuille de travail soit utilisé 
pendant qu'un contour de revue de film feuille de travail de Santa 
Claus"THe de film" inclut un certain nombre "activités d'essai Cloze 
d'".</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este isto da folha do trabalho seja usado 
enquanto um esboço da revisão da película folha do trabalho Santa 
Claus"THe do filme de" inclui um número "atividades do teste cloze 
de".</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo isto del foglio del lavoro è usato mentre
un profilo di revisione della pellicola foglio del lavoro della Santa 
Claus"THe di Film" include un certo numero "di attività della 
prova Cloze".</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το isto φύλλων εργασίας χρησιμοποιείται 
δεδομένου ότι ένα περίγραμμα αναθεώρησης ταινιών φύλλο 
εργασίας Santa Claus"THe των κινηματογράφων" περιλαμβάνει 
διάφορες "δραστηριότητες cloze δοκιμήσ".</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Se utilice este isto de la hoja del trabajo 
mientras que un contorno de la revisión de la película hoja del 
trabajo de Santa Claus"THe de la película" incluye un número 
"actividades de la prueba cloze de".</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Englisch</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Weihnachtsmann</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Film</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zusammenfassung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Anglais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le Père noël</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">film</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">revue</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Inglês</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Papai Noel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">filme</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">revisão</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Inglese</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il Babbo Natale</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">film</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">rassegna</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αγγλικά</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αγιος Βασίλης</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">κινηματογράφος</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">αναθεώρηση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
